name: browser(_:acceptDrop:atRow:column:dropOperation:)
desc: Sent to the delegate during a dragging session to determine whether to accept the drop.
declaration:
optional func browser(_ browser: NSBrowser, 
           acceptDrop info: NSDraggingInfo, 
                atRow row: Int, 
               column: Int, 
        dropOperation: NSBrowser.DropOperation) -> Bool
